bitfield.name: options

def.comment: 'Official' rooms are designated as such, but generally don't alter permissions in any way.
Deleted rooms are only viewable by administrators, and are otherwise read-only.

Hidden rooms are not displayed under any circumstances, except to site administrators. Similarly, only administrators may set this flag. Hidden rooms can still be accessed by anyone who both has permission and knows the room ID.
These rooms may not be posted in, and may be optimised specially. Otherwise, they behave normally, and only people with permission to view or know a room will be able to do such..

bitfield.name: permissions
bitfield.comment: An argument can be made that these are all sequential, and should instead simply be 1/2/3/4/... That argument is right. We're doing this anyway.

def.comment: This allows the room's common properties -- topic, name, etc. -- to be known, and its messages to be viewed. The room is effectively read-only if this permission is set alone.
This allows a user to post in a room.
Whether a user may modify a room's topic.
Whether a user may edit or delete posts made by other users.
Whether a user may modify common room properties, such as its name and censor lists.
Whether a user may alter user permissions for the room.
This prevents users from joining groups. Instead, a user may be put into this group by an administrator.
If set, a user can only join this group once approved by a moderator for the group.

def.note: Basically, when this feature is active, two sets of default permissions will exist -- one for unapproved users, and another for approved users. When approved, a user's permissions will be set to the new permissions

def.comment: If false, Disallows a user from creating and being part of OTR and private rooms.
If false, Disallows a user from creating and being part of OTR and private rooms where any user is not on the user's friend list.
Only the site owner may alter this user's permissions. The site owner is set in config.php.
Gives the user full moderation to all rooms, except private rooms.
Allows the user to review the contents of messages between private users, forbid private communications between particular users.
Allows the administrator to make site-wide bans.
Allows the administrator to remove uploads made by users, and view uploads made privately.
Allows the administrator to author and modify censor lists.
